cause.description:
Collective Roots is a non-profit organization that works with school communities to design and sustain school-based organic gardens, teach students about environmental science and nutrition, and provide project-based education that is integrated into the core curriculum. In the process, we develop young urban leaders who understand where their food comes from and how their actions impact human and environmental health.
1. Every child, no matter what their economic situation, deserves an education.
2. Every child, no matter what their economic situation, deserves to have access to fresh, whole food.
3. We must teach children how their actions impact human and environmental health.
cause.mission: The mission of Collective Roots (CR) is to develop young urban leaders who understand where their food comes from and how their actions impact human and environmental health.
cause.name: Environment Education / Nutrition Education in under-served areas -- Collective Roots
